verses.name: Ephesians 2:17
verses.text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off, and to them that were nigh.

verses.name: Ephesians 2:18
verses.text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father.

verses.name: Ephesians 2:19
verses.text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;

verses.name: Ephesians 2:20
verses.text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone;

verses.name: Ephesians 2:21
verses.text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord:

verses.name: Ephesians 2:22
verses.text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit.
